system.name: Application Programmer's Communication Interface for TEA2

TechTool orders and receives ESW packages, sends reports etc. to NAMS.
NAMS orders ESW packages from CVSP.
NAMS gets information for a specific chassis ID from VDA. NAMS also needs to update VDA with updated information about the vehicle
TSP sends ESW Product unique data to VDA in order to report the status of the product when it leaves production and enters the aftermarket.
NAMS gets all the needed software information for a specific software operation.
NAMS sends invoice information to IBIS

The DtR Tool use the services in APCI+ in order to communicate with the ECU:s in the product (vehicle).
When a component has been mounted in a chassis CDA needs to send relevant unique component data to VDA.
The DtR Tool use the services in APCI+ in order to communicate with the nodes in the product (vehicle).
The DtR Tool orders ESW packages, sends reports etc to NAMS.
The DtR Tool orders ESW packages, sends reports etc to NAMS.
The DtR Tool orders ESW packages, sends reports etc to NAMS.
The DtR Tool orders ESW packages, sends reports etc to NAMS.
DtR Tool checks if there are any application updates available.
NAMS orders ESW packages from CVSP
NAMS gets supersessions, conversion kits and node dependencies from the Configurator.
NAMS sends ESW packages, chargeability information etc to DtR Tool.
NAMS retrieves commercial part numbers (which includes the cost of the operation) from IBIS .
DtR Tool sends logged vehicle data to LVD.
DtR needs apci+ db updates from TEA core in order to supply the aftermarket tool clients with apci+ db patches enabling them to support products using new embedded software parts.
NAMS gets information for a specific chassis ID from VDA. NAMS also needs to update VDA with updated information about the vehicle.
NAMS gets information for a specific chassis ID from VDA. NAMS also needs to update VDA with updated information about the vehicle.
NAMS requests VSS information from VSS.
TSP sends ESW Product unique data to VDA in order to report the status of the product when it leaves production and enters the aftermarket

TSP sends ESW Product unique data (for a component) to CDA in order to report the status of the product when it leaves production and enters the aftermarket. TSP also send a component conversion information to CDA informing CDA that the component has been mounted in a chassis and it is no longer available as stand alone component.

TSP sends ESW Product unique data (for a component) to CDA in order to report the status of the product when it leaves production and enters the aftermarket. TSP also send a component conversion information to CDA informing CDA that the component has been mounted in a chassis and it is no longer available as stand alone component.
VDA gets information for a specific component from CDA. VDA also needs to update CDA with updated information about the component.
VDA+ validate ParameterValue at TeaCore
NAMS sends the requested software files to AU server, where they are stored using unique unidentifiable file names.
SEWS generates a APCI+ db Password for a specific DtR Tool Release Id
DtR Tool fetch APCI- db Password
NAMS calls Embla to compile a list of the necessary patches
DtR Tool reports that its APCI+ database has been updated
TT reports that its APCI+ database has been updated
Guided Diagnostic developer fetch Diagnostic Information from SEWS and import it into GradeX(TechTool/DtR Tool)
